Hervé Lybohy (ka amụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 24 n'ọnwa Julaị n'afọ 1983) bụ onye egwuregwu bọọlụ nke na-agbara Championnat National 3 club Thonon Evian bọọlụ
A mụrụ ya na Ivory Coast, ọ na-agbara ndị otu mba Niger bọọlụ.
Na Mee 2018, a mara ọkwa na Lybohy ga-esonyere Nîmes, nke a kwalitere ọhụrụ na Ligue 1, site na Ligue 2 n'akụkụ Paris FC na nnyefe n'efu maka oge 2018–19
Ọ bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta otu afọ.
Na Julaị 2019, mgbe otu oge gasịrị na Ligue 1, Lybohy sonyeere Nancy na Ligue 2.
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2020, Lybohy kwagara Championnat National n'akụkụ Orléans
Ọ bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta otu afọ na nhọrọ nke abụọ.
A mụrụ Lybohy na Ivory Coast ma ọ bụ onye Nigerien. O mere nke mbụ ya maka ndị otu mba Niger n'ọnwa Ọktọba afọ 2019.
